wikipedia_page.main: Henry Charles Lacy (1799 – 1869) was a British Whig politician.Lacy became a Whig Member of Parliament (MP) for Bodmin at the 1847 general election, but stood down at the next election in 1852.

response: A dyer by trade, Johnson was married to Jane Lacy, daughter of Henry Lacy who also served in the parliament of 1536.
